dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1991 IH: Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act Extension Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bishop of Utah (for himself and Mr. Grijalva) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To extend the authority of the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act Extension Act of 2015.

section.header: Extension of authority under Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act
section.text: Section 810 of the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act (16 U.S.C. 6809) is amended to read as follows:
The authority of the Secretary to carry out this title shall terminate on September 30, 2017.
